items.short_desc: The opener has been a consistent performer for Punjab.
items.asset_title: KL Rahul appointed new captain of Punjab in the Indian T20 League

items.short_desc: Catch all the action live on Star Sports on December 19.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League auctions: When and where to watch

items.short_desc: Starc last played in the league in 2015 while Root has never been part of it
items.asset_title: Mitchell Starc, Joe Root opt out of Indian T20 league auctions

items.short_desc: The Indian T20 league is looking forward to up the ante in the coming 2020 season through some game-changing decisions.
items.asset_title: Indian T20 League plans radical new changes ahead of 2020 season

items.short_desc: Punjab have reportedly made future plans for a life without Ravichandran Ashwin, with a new captain being already tipped.
items.asset_title: Reports: Ravichandran Ashwin to be released by Punjab

items.short_desc: Tom Moody, who was around for six years, got replaced by Trevor Bayliss as the head coach of the Hyderabad franchise.
items.asset_title: Hyderabad appoint Brad Haddin as their assistant coach

items.short_desc: Brendon McCullum announced his retirement from all forms of cricket after the GT20 tournament in Canada earlier this month.
items.asset_title: Brendon McCullum to coach Kolkata in the Indian T20 League

items.short_desc: The franchise-based competition has been an 8-team competition with two teams being included for a short period in the past
items.asset_title: BCCI mulling including two more teams in Indian T20 League

items.short_desc: The 34-year-old had sustained a split webbing between his right thumb and index finger that required four stitches in the ODI series opener.

items.short_desc: Ace Indian batsman KL Rahul revealed that less game time bothered him but he had full belief in his preparations.
items.asset_title: IND vs ENG ODI: Lack of game time played on my mind, says KL Rahul

items.short_desc: With Shreyas Iyer injured, Suryakumar Yadav and Rishabh Pant could play for India. Watch India vs England 2nd ODI on live streaming, get telecast details and schedule.
items.asset_title: Suryakumar Yadavâ€™s ODI debut likely as India look to seal ODI series vs England - watch live

items.short_desc: BCCI is yet to confirm extent of Iyerâ€™s shoulder injury which he sustained while fielding in the first ODI against England at Pune
items.asset_title: Shreyas Iyer ruled out of England ODI series, expected to miss first-half of 2021 Indian T20 League

items.short_desc: The CSA 4-Day Franchise Series final will be played between 25-29 March. Get full squads and India match times for the Dolphins vs Titans final.
items.asset_title: CSA 4-Day Franchise Series 2020-21 final: Dolphins vs Titans for the title, get squads and India match times

items.short_desc: The umpire's call rule has been under the scanner since it was first brought into the sport, but ICC have decided to stick with it.
items.asset_title: ICC set to back the â€˜umpireâ€™s callâ€™ rule despite limitations

items.short_desc: Pacer Prasidh Krishna recorded the best bowling figures in an ODI debut for India when he picked up 4/54 against England in the first match in Pune in the 2021 series.
items.asset_title: Prasidh Krishna becomes first Indian to pick four-wicket haul on ODI debut

items.short_desc: Will Suryakumar Yadav make his ODI debut? Find out where to watch India vs England 1st ODI on live streaming, get telecast details, match times and squads.
items.asset_title: India look to continue winning momentum vs England in ODI series - watch live

items.short_desc: From pre-Independence tales to stories from the 2011 ICC World Cup, Indian filmmakers have not missed the opportunity to make cricket movies. Hereâ€™s the complete list.
items.asset_title: Indian cricket movies: Get bowled over by these Bollywood films

items.short_desc: The Emirates D10 League 2021 will start on Thursday, March 24. Get the full schedule, fixtures, match times and know where to watch live streaming in India.
items.asset_title: Emirates D10 League 2021 kicks-off with defending champs ECB Blues in action - watch live in India

items.short_desc: From Prasidh Krishnaâ€™s best bowling figures on ODI debut to Krunal Pandyaâ€™s record-breaking fifty, here are some key stats from the first ODI at Pune.
items.asset_title: India vs England: Key stats from 1st ODI in Pune

items.short_desc: Krunal Pandya created a new record for scoring the quickest half-century on debut in the 50 over game but where does it stack up against the fastest 50 in ODI.
items.asset_title: Fastest 50 in ODIs: The quickest of them all and the Indian record

items.short_desc: The highest partnership in ODI is 372 between Chris Gayle and Marlon Samuels. The record stand was for the second wicket against Zimbabwe at the 2015 ICC World Cup.
items.asset_title: Highest stands in ODIs: Record progression, by each wicket and more

items.short_desc: The Arjuna Award for cricket has been awarded to 56 players so far, 12 of them have been women. The award is the second-highest sporting honour of India.
items.asset_title: Arjuna Award for cricket: From Salim Durani to Deepti Sharma, the complete honours list

items.short_desc: TV punditry, politics and reality shows; the 2011 World Cup-winning Indian team has been busy since they lifted the trophy a decade ago. Here's a brief on each player.
items.asset_title: 2011 World Cup-winning Indian team: Where are they now?

items.short_desc: India are on a fine run of form, but their record in the ODI format isn't particularly great. Take a look at what you can expect from India vs England ODI series.
items.asset_title: India vs England Adda Notes: Numbers that will help you ace the ODI series
